message.content:
cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.DM, cs.LO

Reasoning: 
- cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory) is the most likely category as the paper deals with regular languages and automata recognizing these languages.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses the computational complexity of decision problems for closures of regular languages.
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is relevant as the paper provides lower and upper bounds on the size of the smallest automata recognizing these closures and interiors.
- cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) is relevant as the paper deals with subwords and superwords, which are discrete objects.
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) is relevant as the paper deals with decision problems for regular languages, which can be seen as logical problems.
